fieldUpdates.description: Update the Member Search Field with the US CSR Link, if Member Search is empty, but Member ID is populated
fieldUpdates.name: Case - Update Member Search

fieldUpdates.description: This changes the value of the checkbox "Cloned Case" to the value True.
fieldUpdates.name: Mark Cloned Case as True

fieldUpdates.description: ReOpen Count to Zero On Create
fieldUpdates.name: ReOpen Count to Zero On Create

fieldUpdates.description: Set Case Reason to N: Biz Dev
fieldUpdates.name: Set Case Reason to N: Biz Dev

fieldUpdates.description: Update Case Description with the information available in Help Needed
fieldUpdates.name: Update Case Description

rules.description: The cases from mobilesupport@care.com are supposed to be auto-closed as soon as they are created because we're effectively using Salesforce as an auto-responder for that email address. See requirements here: https://wiki.carezen.local/x/BQ-O
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.Name = 'Mobile Help', ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Email - Auto Response') ,($Setup.Override_Validation_Rules__c.Override_Case_Workflow_Rules__c = FALSE))

rules.description: Fill the Member Search Link, if Member ID is not empty. Part of Careus-15336/SFORCE-1095

SFORCE-2447 Task will be triggered after the API Data is pulled, and the Case Status is updated by the API to "Pulled" Once created, the Task will be attached to the BUC Case, assigned to the Case Owner, and displayed in the Case Activity
Marks that one of the skills on a case changed so that BREeze picks it up.

rules.fullName: Chat Case - Help Needed to Description
rules.description: WFR to add the Chat's request Help Needed to the Case description when there are no Agents online and the User decides to create a case
When a Case is cloned this will check the checkbox "Cloned Case"
If "Legal Case Type" is selected, auto populate case "Description" field into "Safety Notes" field
adds a value to the count, whenever a case is closed. Record Types: Standard, Call Center, Int. Email, Int. Call Center
rules.formula: AND( OR( RecordTypeId = "01270000000Dxzj", RecordTypeId = "01270000000Dq7E", RecordTypeId = "01270000000Hmqb", RecordTypeId = "01270000000Hmqc" ), PRIORVALUE(IsClosed)=True,($Setup.Override_Validation_Rules__c.Override_Case_Workflow_Rules__c = FALSE))

rules.fullName: ReOpen Count to Zero On Create
rules.description: ReOpen Count to Zero On Create

tasks.description: Please complete your task and close this activity.
tasks.subject: Case Intake Activity

tasks.description: Task will be triggered after the API Data is pulled
tasks.subject: Case Status Pulled
